title: BRIEF-African Phoenix Investments Updates On Disposal Of Stangen
text:
BRIEF-African Phoenix Investments Updates On Disposal Of Stangen

Stock Markets 7 minutes ago (Oct 01, 2019 13:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-African Phoenix Investments Updates On Disposal Of Stangen Oct 1 (Reuters) - African Phoenix Investments Ltd : * DISPOSAL OF STANGEN UPDATE * EFFECTIVE DATE FOR SALE OF 100% HOLDING IN STANGEN TO KING PRICE IS CONFIRMED AS 1 OCTOBER * PARTIES TO AGREEMENT HAVE AGREED TO EXTENSION OF DATE OF FULFILMENT OF CONDITIONS PRECEDENT TO 29 NOVEMBER 2019

BRIEF-African Phoenix Investments Updates On Disposal Of Stangen
